summary:
Welcome to the Regeneration Newsroom Podcast November 2018A joint venture between Ethan Soloviev’s Regeneration Newsroom and the Investing in Regenerative Agriculture podcast. Where Ethan Soloviev and Koen van Seijen highlight the top articles, books, videos, podcasts and other news on Regenerative Agriculture and Business!"

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.
Other ways to support our work:
- Share the podcast
- Give a 5-star rating
- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 

----------------------------------------------------------- 

Did we miss something? Do you have some news? Send us your thoughts in the comments below! 

This month we discuss:

  • Two outcome based standards! 
  • Companies leading the change
  • Regeneration light or Regeneration journey


Enjoy,
Ethan and Koen

Find the Regeneration Newsroom Podcast of March 2019 here:
https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2019/03/24/regeneration-newsroom-podcast-ft-ethan-soloviev-march-2019/.
